description: Treat the family with this easy five-ingredient peri peri chicken wings recipe. Slow cooked for extra tenderness, theyâ€™re best served with a lemon mayo.
name: Slow-Cooker 5-Ingredient Peri-Peri Chicken Wings Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5kg Woolworths chicken wings, wing tips removed and discarded, halve wings at joint

recipeInstructions.text: Place chicken and 2 tbs sauce in a large glass or ceramic bowl. Toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate overnight, if time permits.
Place chicken in a 5.5L slow cooker. Cover with lid and cook on low for 4 hours, turning chicken halfway through, or until chicken is tender and cooked through.
Place remaining sauce in a small saucepan over medium heat. Bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 4 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until slightly thickened.

Combine mayonnaise, zest and lemon juice in a small bowl. Season. Place chicken in a serving dish. Drizzle over sauce and toss gently to combine. Sprinkle with green onion. Serve with lemon mayonnaise.
